text: Delfino López Aparicio (9 February 1960 - 20 December 2020) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the National Regeneration Movement. López Aparicio was born in Mexico City. He was a member of the Mexican Chamber of Deputies from 1 September 2018 until his death in 2020. López Aparicio died on 20 December 2020 at a hospital in Mexico City from COVID-19, aged 60.Fallece Delfino López Aparicio, diputado federal de Morena ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico City Category:Mexican politicians
title: Delfino López Aparicio
